join condition: pedsnet_pcornet_valueset_map on source_concept_id  Where source_concept_class='Dose unit'

vocabulary.concept, vocabulary.concept_relationship on concept_code where drug_type_concept_id IN (38000177, 38000180), relationship_id = 'RxNorm has dose form'  and drug_concept_id = concept_id_1
  and concept_id_2 = concept_id
